sentences.en: a magazine on health and fitness
an exercise programme to improve your fitness
Fitness is relative; one must always ask "Fit for what?"
sentences.cn: “适合”是相对而言的；应该常常问一问“适合什么？”

sentences.en: He questioned McNeil’s fitness for high office.
sentences.cn: 他质疑麦克尼尔是否适合身居高位。

sentences.en: His eagerness will not avail against the fitness and skill of his opponent.
sentences.cn: 他求胜心切,但这并不能抵挡得住对手的健壮与技艺.

sentences.en: I'd like to join an aerobics class to improve my fitness.
sentences.cn: 我想参加有氧运动训练班来增强体质。

sentences.en: Lewis has recently recovered his fitness and will clash with Christie in the 4x100m relay.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯近来恢复了状态，将在4×100米接力赛中和克里斯蒂一决雌雄。

sentences.en: No one doubts his fitness for the position.
sentences.cn: 谁也不怀疑他适于担任这一职务.

sentences.en: No one questions her fitness for the job.
sentences.cn: 没人怀疑她能胜任这项工作.

sentences.en: Running marathons requires a high level of physical fitness .
sentences.cn: 跑马拉松需要身体十分强健。

sentences.en: Running marathons requires a high level of physical fitness.
sentences.cn: 跑马拉松需要身体十分强健。

sentences.en: The emphasis is on developing fitness through exercises and training.
sentences.cn: 重点在于通过锻炼促进健康。

sentences.en: the latest fitness craze to sweep the country
sentences.cn: 最近风靡全国的健身热

sentences.en: The multibillion-dollar fitness industry rakes in fat profits from our hunger to look good.
sentences.cn: 数十亿美元的健身产业利用我们的爱美之心赚取巨额利润。

sentences.en: There is a debate about his fitness for the highest office.
sentences.cn: 针对他是否能胜任最高职务展开了争论。

sentences.en: They include the floor exercises as a regular part of their fitness routine.
sentences.cn: 他们把自由体操做为日常健身运动的固定环节。

sentences.en: They're doing exercises to improve their fitness.
sentences.cn: 他们为增强体质而做体操.

sentences.en: Whichever of the fitness classes you opt for, trained instructors are there to help you.
sentences.cn: 不管你选择哪种健身课，都会有专业教练帮助你。

words.tran_cn: 健康的；合适的；恰当的；准备好的
合适的；订做的；有…设备的
适应（fit的过去分词）；合适；为…提供设备
安装；使……适应；使……合身；与……相符

phrases.tran_cn: 身体健康；体力；身体适宜性
体能测验；身体适宜性测验

trans.tran_en: when you are healthy and strong enough to do hard work or play sports
